data.title: Ella Fitzgerald: Ella Wishes You A Swinging Christmas LP (Ruby)
data.meta_description: The most iconic holiday record in the Verve repertoire, and one of the most successful jazz holiday albums of all time is receiving new life for the 2023 season with a new cover! New first-ever “Ruby Red” color variant with a new Ella-focused collectable cover. Ranked #10 on Rolling Stone’s 25 Greatest Christmas Albums
data.text:
The most iconic holiday record in the Verve repertoire, and one of the most successful jazz holiday albums of all time is receiving new life for the 2023 season with a new cover! New first-ever “Ruby Red” color variant with a new Ella-focused collectable cover. Ranked #10 on Rolling Stone’s 25 Greatest Christmas Albums of All Time and ranked #2 on The Guardian’s 20 Greatest Holiday Albums Ever. “The best holiday album ever” (Salon). Jingle Bells; Sleigh Ride; Winter Wonderland; and more!

Tracklist:

Side A 1. Jingle Bells

2. Santa Claus Is Coming To Town

3. Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas

4. What Are You Doing New Year’s Eve?

5. Sleigh Ride

6. The Christmas Song

Side B 1. Good Morning Blues

2. Let It Snow! Let It Snow! Let It Snow!

3. Winter Wonderland

4. Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer

5. Frosty The Snowman

Please note that each vinyl is unique and the colors may appear slightly different from the image displayed.
